title: Vitalik Buterin: SIM Swap Attack Behind $700,000 Twitter Hack
description: The Ethereum co-founder’s account was hacked and used to promote a fake NFT giveaway that stole $691,000 from his followers.

title: SBF, US justice department wrangle over expert witness credibility
description:
The U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) and disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) are currently entangled in a legal tussle over their respective witnesses’ list, according to Sept. 11 court filings. CryptoSlate previously reported that the DOJ and SBF had moved to disqualify all the expert witnesses called upon by each party, citing various reasons, […]

The post SBF, US justice department wrangle over expert witness credibility appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: USDC and DAI more susceptible to de-pegging, say analysts
description: Stablecoins from Circle and MakerDAO have been less stable than those from Tether and Binance in the last couple of years, states a new S&P Global report.

title: Monero falls amid Binance delisting plans, QUBE rallying
description: InQubeta is rising while Monero prices after Binance said it will delist it. QUBE has raised over $2.9 million in the ongoing presale

title: BTC/TUSD volume tumbles 88% as Binance removes zero fees
description: Binance’s decision to remove zero fees from the BTC/TUSD trading pair had a significant effect on TrueUSD volume, according to Kaiko. The daily trading volume of the BTC/TUSD pair plummeted 88% from $636 million to $72 million shortly after Binance…

title: Coinbase Raises Stellar-Based USDC Interest Rates to Historical High of 5%
description: Coinbase has increased the interest rate on USDC holdings from 4% to 5%, emphasizing its commitment to promoting stablecoin adoption and competing with Tether’s USDT. The SEC’s clarification that stablecoins like USDC are not unregistered securities offerings enabled Coinbase to raise the reward rate. In a significant development, the leading cryptocurrency exchange, Coinbase, has recently [...]

title: TRON (TRX) Founder Wants to Save Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Litecoin (LTC) by Buying FTX’s Holding Tokens
description: Justin Sun has revealed plans to buy up FTX’s holding tokens so as to relieve the market of the selling pressure. Investors have been dumping ahead of a possible approval for FTX to liquidate its holding tokens later this week. Tron founder Justin Sun has revealed his plans to save the crypto market from a [...]

title: Cardano (ADA) Price to Get a Boost to $0,20 with Hydra Pay, the Decentralized Payment Revolution with 1M TPS and Web3.0 Compatibility
description: Cardano introduces Hydra Pay, a new decentralized payment system with near-instant settlements and high scalability potential. title: $150,000,000,000 Coming to Bitcoin Market Once BlackRock BTC ETF Gets Approved, Predicts Bloomberg Analyst
description:
A senior Bloomberg exchange-traded fund (ETF) analyst says around $150 billion worth of capital could flow into the Bitcoin (BTC) market within a year or two if BlackRock’s BTC spot exchange-traded fund (ETF) gets approved. In a new interview with journalist Paul Barron, analyst Eric Balchunas says that BlackRock’s ETF could elevate the top crypto […]

The post $150,000,000,000 Coming to Bitcoin Market Once BlackRock BTC ETF Gets Approved, Predicts Bloomberg Analyst appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
